techmeme.title: Meta's fact-checking overhaul is set to deepen a growing schism between how platforms do content moderation in the US and in stricter regions like Europe (Cristiano Lima-Strong/Washington Post)
Sources: Movement Labs, which is building a layer-2 Ethereum blockchain, is set to raise a $100M Series B at a $3B valuation, after raising $38M in April 2024 (Leo Schwartz/Fortune)
AMD invests $20M in drug-discovery company Absci, which will move toward greater use of AMD's GPUs; Absci has 470+ AI chips, most of which are from Nvidia (Belle Lin/Wall Street Journal)
Meta will launch a test in Germany, France and the US to publish eBay listings on Facebook Marketplace, after it was fined €798M by EU for abusing dominance (Samuel Stolton/Bloomberg)
In a first, an EU court fines the EC €400 for breaching its own data protection rules by transferring a citizen's data to the US via "Sign in with Facebook" (Reuters)
